caption.text:
I'm starting a new series of tutorials and articles on generative and interactive art in TouchDesigner. In this first post I talk about my daily sketching process and look at some of the techniques I explored in my first year. Find the full article on my website (link in bio.) I'll be going more in depth into many of these topics soon, thanks for following!
.
Shout out to @zach.lieberman, whose writing on daily sketching inspired me to start myself. Admittedly, this first post is in part modeled after his articles on the topic. .
Also thanks to @willcgeary for pointing me towards Zach's work last year, @l05_ for initially introducing me to Touchdesigner, and the rest of the generative and interactive art community which serves as a constant source of inspiration.
.
.
